sect2.title: Binutils Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, ranlib, strip Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, cp, echo, expr, hostname, ln, ls, mkdir mv, rm, rmdir, sleep, sort, touch, tr, true, uname, uniq Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Glibc: ldconfig Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Gawk: gawk Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
